long_description: This hybrid/touring fender set is compatible with disc brakes and works with frames and forks without eyelets. SpeedEZ quick attachment system solves troublesome mounting problems. Quick-adjusting, stainless-steel hardware is pre-installed for hassle-free mounting. Fenders are made from Superflex(TM) unbreakable all-weather polycarbonate material and have pre-installed mud flaps. Includes all the necessary hardware for mounting to virtually any bike. Set includes front and rear fenders.
short_description: This hybrid/touring fender set is compatible with disc brakes and works with frames and forks without eyelets.
